CustomField.description: The Location associated with the Employment Cost Item. If a Parent Location is selected, the Employment Cost Item will apply to all the Locations child records. If left blank, the Employment Cost will apply to all Locations
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Location associated with the Employment Cost Item. If a Parent Location is selected, the Employment Cost Item will apply to all the Locations child records. If left blank, the Employment Cost will apply to all Locations
CustomField.label: Location
